applet.name: DarkFlatSkinInstaller
applet.title: Dark Flat Skin Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs the Dark Flat Skin for Squeezeplay (800 x 480 resolution). *** More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1 *** Windows and Linux users: please read the FAQ BEFORE installing.
applet.creator: AF

applet.name: DarkFlatSkinInstaller
applet.title: Dark Flat Skin Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs the Dark Flat Skin on your piCorePlayer (800 x 480 resolution). *** More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1
applet.creator: AF

applet.name: DarkFlatSkinInstaller
applet.title: Dark Flat Skin Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs the Dark Flat Skin on your SB Touch. *** More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1. *** See FAQ for information on known SB Touch issue.
applet.creator: AF

applet.name: NPInfoPlusInstaller
applet.title: NowPlaying Info Plus
applet.desc: Display additional information on the Now Playing screen (rating, year, audio metadata, status icons). *** More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1
applet.creator: AF

plugin.name: AlternativePlayCount
plugin.title: Alternative Play Count
plugin.desc: Provides alternative play counts and skip counts that aim to reflect your true listening history. You set a time after which a song counts as played. If you skip the song before, it counts as skipped, not played. Use the data with other plugins to create/play smart playlists (dynamic playlists), create virtual libraries or skip tracks.
Fournit un nombre de lectures et de sauts alternatif qui vise à refléter votre vrai historique de lecture. Définissez une durée après laquelle un morceau est considéré comme joué.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: ContextStats
plugin.title: Context Stats
plugin.desc: Display lists of tracks, albums or artists sorted by statistics from the context menus of artists, albums, genres, years and playlists.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: CustomSkip3
plugin.title: Custom Skip
plugin.desc: Set rules for when the current track or upcoming tracks in your player's playlist should be skipped and removed from the playlist automatically.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: CustomStartStopTimes
plugin.title: Custom Start Stop Times
plugin.desc: Skip unwanted parts of a song (e.g. annoying intros, silence at the end or in the middle).
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: CustomTagImporter
plugin.title: Custom Tag Importer
plugin.desc: Scans track information from custom tags in your music files (incl. rating tags).
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DarkDefaultSkin
plugin.title: Dark Default Skin
plugin.desc: Dark-themed version of the LMS Default skin
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DarkLogicSkin
plugin.title: Dark Logic Skin
plugin.desc: Dark-themed version of the LMS Logic Teal skin
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DynamicPlaylists4
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlists
plugin.desc: Use smart playlists (dynamic playlists) to play continuous music mixes based on your selection criteria.
Jouez des mix continus de musique basés sur des critères de sélection définis dans les listes de lecture dynamiques.
Nutze intelligente/dynamische Wiedergabelisten, um kontinuierliche Wiedergabelisten basierend auf deinen Selektionskriterien zu erstellen.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DynamicPlaylistCreator
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlist Creator
plugin.desc: Helps you create custom smart playlists (dynamic playlists) for the Dynamic Playlists plugin.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: PotPourri
plugin.title: PotPourri
plugin.desc: A collection of small features. Examples: change track order of saved/client playlists, set power-on volume level for players or time to turn off all players each day, export saved playlists to playlist files with custom file paths/extensions… Complete feature list, screenshots and more information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: RatingsLight
plugin.title: Ratings Light
plugin.desc: Set, import, export, log, backup and restore track ratings. Create virtual libraries/library views for rated tracks with LMS browse menus.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: VirtualLibraryCreator
plugin.title: Virtual Library Creator
plugin.desc: A quick and easy way to create and manage your own virtual libraries/library views.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: VisualStatistics
plugin.title: Visual Statistics
plugin.desc: Have a look at your library statistics with charts.
Explorez les statistiques de votre librairie avec des graphiques.
Bekijk jouw mediabibliotheek statistieken door middel van grafieken.
plugin.creator: AF
